DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1 study evaluate PDE10 enzyme occupancy use Positron Emission Tomography single dose PF-02545920 Healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate The PDE10 Enzyme Occupancy Following A Single Dose Of PF-02545920 In Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: healthy male volunteer History orthostatic hypotension History prior radiation exposure research purpose , radiation therapy
